item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

I know the time has flown by, but we actually have reached our 100th Monday together. Let's come together and thank our wonderful happy hour organizers for all their hard work to take the edge off our Mondays.

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

BAR at 254 Crown St
http://www.barnightcl...

The specials are:
$2 Drafts
$5 Martinis

Please RSVP so the bar knows how many of us are coming and they are ready for us.

Your contact for this event is Devorah: 203-314-4329

(And PS it's my birthday, so we really do have a lot to celebrate!) :P
item.name: Celebrate our 100th Happy hour at BAR!!!
